title: Graphing Proportional Relationships
mathConcept: Proportional Relationships - Tables, Graphs, and Equations
learningGoals: Plot points from a table on a coordinate plane
Find the slope (rate of change) from a table
Write the equation of a proportional relationship in the form y = kx

scenarios.name: Snow Storm
scenarios.context: Snow falling at a constant rate during a storm

scenarios.name: Gaming XP Grind
scenarios.context: Earning experience points in a video game at a constant rate

scenarios.name: Phone Battery Drain
scenarios.context: Battery percentage decreasing at a constant rate while gaming
